CustomField.formula:
( FID_Risk_Adjusted_Rate__c *
IF( ISPICKVAL (FID_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$500,000"), 0.85, IF( ISPICKVAL (FID_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$1,000,000"), 1.00, IF( ISPICKVAL (FID_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$2,000,000"), 1.65, IF( ISPICKVAL (FID_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$3,000,000"), 2.05, IF( ISPICKVAL (FID_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$4,000,000"), 2.45, IF( ISPICKVAL (FID_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$5,000,000"), 2.80, 0 )))))))
- FID_Risk_Adjusted_Rate__c
CustomField.label: FID Limit Modifier (Adj)
